events.message: I would like to request a refund for my recent order because the product did not meet my expectations and I am not willing to keep it.
The customer issue has been identified as a refund request related to dissatisfaction with the purchased product.
A customer support representative has been assigned to handle the refund case for the customer.
Hello! Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request. Can you please provide your order number and any details about why you want the refund?
Could you please confirm if the product was unopened and if you have the receipt or order confirmation email available?
I have the receipt and the order number is 78563921. The product was opened, but it was defective and not as described, so I want a refund.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process immediately and send you a prepaid return label to send the product back to us.
That sounds good, thank you for handling this quickly. I will wait for the return label and send the item back as soon as possible.
The refund has been processed and the return label was emailed to you. Please return the product within 14 days to complete the refund.
We are checking in to ensure you received the return label and to see if you need any further assistance with your refund.
The refund case has been closed as the product was returned and the refund completed successfully. Thank you for your patience.
